titles.title: Tanker Anti-Reflagging Act
A bill prohibiting the documentation under the laws of the United States of any vessel beneficially owned by a sovereign nation adjacent to the Persian Gulf.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Executive Comment Requested from DOD, DOT, State.
Referred to Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

bill.summary: 6/10/1987--Introduced. Tanker Anti-Reflagging Act - Prohibits the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating from issuing a certificate of documentation for a vessel which is beneficially owned by a sovereign nation adjacent to the Persian Gulf.
